original: dpal ldan chu dbang mgon po ni //
analyzed: dpal ldan chu dbang mgon po ni //

original: dgos 'dod 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dgos 'dod 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: the source of all needs and desires, I pay homage and praise.

original: phyag g-yas thod pa khrag bkang bsnams //
analyzed: phyag g-yas thod pa khrag bkang bsnams //
translated: His right hand holds a skull-cup filled with blood,

original: g-yon pa gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yon pa gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin //

original: 'gro ba dbul bas rab gdungs pa'i //
analyzed: 'gro ba dbul bas rab gdungs pa'i //

original: de 'dong skong la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: de 'dong skong la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise.üîΩWith an angry demeanor, his hair bristling upward,

original: khro bo'i cha lugs dbu skra gyen du brje sa // mi'u thung byis ba gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa //
analyzed: khro bo'i cha lugs dbu skra gyen du brje sa // mi'u thung byis ba gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa //
translated: a dwarf, youthful, with a plump body,

original: nor bdag gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
analyzed: nor bdag gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
translated: he sits on the seat of the lord of wealth, in a cross-legged posture,

original: dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung la phyag 'tshal ba stod //
analyzed: dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung la phyag 'tshal ba stod //
translated: I pay homage to you, the source of all that is needed and desired.

original: mche ba rab gtsigs h'um sgras ma rungs gdul //
analyzed: mche ba rab gtsigs h'um sgras ma rungs gdul //
translated: With your fierce fangs and the sound of HUM, you tame the unruly.

original: dran pa tsam gyis ci bsams 'grub par mdzad //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis ci bsams 'grub par mdzad //
translated: Merely by remembering you, all wishes are fulfilled.

original: yid bzhin nor bu yon tan kun ldan pa //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu yon tan kun ldan pa //
translated: You are the wish-fulfilling jewel endowed with all good qualities.

original: dpal ldan chu dbang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dpal ldan chu dbang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, glorious Varada.

original: au tsushma la gus pas bstod pa yis //
analyzed: au tsushma la gus pas bstod pa yis //
translated: By this praise with devotion to Ucchusma,

original: bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa gang thob des //
analyzed: bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa gang thob des //
translated: May I attain limitless supreme merit.

original: bdag dang sems can ma lus thams cad kyi //
analyzed: bdag dang sems can ma lus thams cad kyi //
translated: Through that, may I and all sentient beingsüîΩBe freed from the bondage of poverty and suffering.

original: dbul phongs sdug bsngal 'ching las grol bar shog /'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa pandi ta dzny'a na badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dbul phongs sdug bsngal 'ching las grol bar shog /'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa pandi ta dzny'a na badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of noble Varuna composed by the pandit Jnanavajra is complete.
